product_name: REI Dragon Stripe Wintersport Socks - Boys' - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The REI Dragon Stripe Winter Sport socks for boys offer snowbound kids warmth and comfort. Blend of merino wool, recycled polyester and nylon provides optimum insulation and moisture management to keep kids' feet warm and dry. A touch of spandex holds sock in place and offers formfitting comfort. Chafe-free toe seams and medium-weight cushioning in the sole, calf and shin enhance comfort. Closeout.
short_description: The REI Dragon Stripe Winter Sport socks for boys offer snowbound kids warmth and comfort.
